mapper.select: select theme_id as themeId, user_id as userId, request, img_url as imgUrl, posted_time as postedTime from theme
select theme_id as themeId, user_id as userId, request, img_url as imgUrl, posted_time as postedTime from theme where theme_id = #{themeId}
select theme_id as themeId, user_id as userId, request, img_url as imgUrl, posted_time as postedTime from theme where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into theme (theme_id, user_id, request, img_url, posted_time) values (#{themeId}, #{userId}, #{request}, #{imgUrl}, current_timestamp)
